entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebAuthenticator on Windows throws unhelpful errors #23616
  • MAUI IOS - Listview click events not working after scrolling with Scrolled handler #23614
  • [iOS] Modernize iOS CollectionView implementation #23613
    9.0-preview7
  • "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" - Core 9 Preview 6 Maui Mac Catalyst Build #23612
    9.0-preview7
  • Change BackButtonBehavior at AppShell level #23611
  • Improving Page Load Experience in MAUI Hybrid Blazor #23610
  • Unable to create the iOS build using the command line from Windows Machine #23609
  • .Net Maui CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly. #23608
    Backlog
  • Not able to equally space menu items of BottomNavigationView using Shell in Android Tablets #23606
    Backlog

Closed

  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor hybrid template #22205
    9.0-preview7
  • IWebView.Source has no setter #23579
  • Resizetizer file access issues on Windows build in Visual Studio #23397
  • Extend MauiMaterialButton to expose a constructor which accepts a style id override #22455
    9.0-preview7
  • Layouts which work fine in iOS are blank in Android, but suddenly work if "touched" via hot reload. #23056

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix menus to only create casting list once #23618
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • Add empty (no sample content) option for Blazor Hybrid #23615
    area-blazor, area-templates

Merged

  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • Add missing ctor overloads to MaterialButton #23517
    community ✨
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area-xaml
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • Fix a few more template ampersand cases #23592
    area-templates

Updated

  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] CarouselView: Changing Position after navigation away then comi… #23477
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Android] Honor IconImageSource.FontImageSource color #23604
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] [iOS] [macOS] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
